abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33580949, pmid33590749, pmid33439902, pmid33475716, pmid33326364, pmid33595634, pmid33472255, pmid33592074, pmid33595746, pmid33280637, pmid33574135, pmid33580968, pmid32628748, pmid33561380, pmid33574281, pmid33580970, pmid33587672, pmid33475701
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2021.02.19
